dc_title_s: Public Service Railway Co., Department of Maintenance of Way, Survey of Bergen Turnpike, Little Ferry and Ridgefield Park, Sheets 4-6
dc_description_s: Sheets 4-6 in a survey of Bergen Turnpike, showing the bridge and railroads over the Hackensack River passing through Little Ferry and Ridgefield Park|Traced from map marked "Property of Samuel J. Shaw, Jr., Ridgefield Park, N.J.|Date used is that on map however map is a tracing|Made by W.H.F.; Traced by C.T.; Checked by F.F.B.|Drawing No. 9488
